trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Santa Clarita
There were no other sightings in Santa Clarita on or around June 24th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsWas at the pool with my children, happened to look up to the southeastern sky, and saw what appeared to be an airplane or helicopter - but was a bright green, with no other identifying lights. As the object came closer overhead, there was no noticable sound, and clearly no other lights as a plane or helicopter would have. This object moved south to north, slowly, and eminated the same color green light the entire time. No flashing, no radiating, just green. My two children 7 and 4, both saw the same thing, the older of the two asked me what the light was. I had no explanation. It took roughly 3 minutes for the object to travel out of view.
